attributes.action:
Nigel Farage To be the people caretaker PM
The people want out with NO DEAL
attributes.additional_details: England Scotland Wales and Ireland have always been Great Britain, but we’ve been listening to to many lies from all MP’s for to long let’s get behind Figel Farage again and make us the United Kingdom’s once  again
attributes.background:
No party’s will challenge for a general election.
We’re not sure if the PM going to deliver what we want.
So we need the one man we all trusted in to take us all the way out and with a clean brake to make us not just Britain again but Great Britain!

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments this includes petitions asking for people to be given or to lose jobs. 

You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/254329
